body_content.explanation: a small plant with blue flowers that grows in mountain areas:
examples: A tiny sprig of gentian given me by a friend has four vivid blue flowers on it.
The Alpine meadows are carpeted with white narcissi and deep blue gentians.

body_content.explanation: any of the many different plants of the gentian family, with blue, white, pink, or yellow flowers:
examples: More than 200 plant species have been found in the fen, including orchids and gentians.
A volunteer found the prairie gentian in a different part of the park last summer.
